channel.title: TravelgateX Documentation – Release Notes
channel.description: Recent changes in Release Notes on TravelgateX Documentation

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Roadmap
Connectiontypesbuyers: GraphQL Schema Changes
item.description: The GraphQL HotelX schema change log is a list of recent and upcoming changes to our GraphQL API schema. It includes backwards-compatible changes, schema previews, and upcoming breaking changes. Check out this list of new releases and changes applied on the HotelX GraphQL API.

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: GraphQL Schema breaking changes
item.description:
role=“alert”>Changes history of deprecated notes previously announced2020-02-25 Deprecated accessCode from HotelCancelInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated language from HotelCancelInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated hotelCode from HotelCancelInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated reference from HotelCancelInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated accessCode from HotelCriteriaBookingInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated language from HotelCriteriaBookingInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead. Deprecated typeSearch from HotelCriteriaBookingInput. Reason: Use new bookingID instead.
[...]

item.title: Connectiontypesbuyers: Hotel-X Changelog
item.description: Easily accessible log of notable changes to HotelX API role=“alert”>All notable changes in our platform will be documented on this page.
